RESOURCE.STRING: INSITE has not been registered. In order to use this application, you need to contact the local distributor and obtain a Basic password. You will need to supply your PC ID when you call.

Functionality passwords unlock additional features in INSITE. In order to obtain a functionality password, you will need to contact the local distributor. You will need to supply your PC ID when you call.

You are about to change the current tool level license for INSITE.
Do you wish to proceed?

(Note: Feature windows currently open may not register the tool
level change until they are closed and re-opened.)

The license you have requested has a lesser tool level than your current license.
Switching to this license may result in fewer tool features and/or lesser tool functionality.
Are you sure you wish to proceed?

(Note: Feature windows currently open may not register the tool level change until they are closed and re-opened.)

The password that was entered is invalid.
Please check the password and try again. If the problem persists, please contact the local distributor for assistance.
The password that was entered is not a Basic password. Please enter a Basic password. If the problem persists, please contact the local distributor.

The password that was entered has expired.
Please check the password and try again. If the problem persists, please contact the local distributor for assistance.
The expiration warning threshold is invalid. The valid range for the expiration warning is 1 to 99 days.

Your current '%s' password will expire in %s day(s).

You can manage existing passwords in the Security panel of Options from the Tools menu.

To enter a new password, click New.

Your current '%s' password has expired.

You can manage existing passwords in the Security panel of Options from the Tools menu.

To enter a new password, click New.

INSITE has detected an invalid PC Date and has been locked to read-only mode. Please verify the PC date and time is accurate, then select OK to enter a password or CANCEL to open INSITE in read-only mode.
INSITE has detected an invalid PC Date. Please note the PCID and Verification Code shown below and contact the local Cummins Distributor to obtain an Unlock password.

INSITE has not been registered. INSITE is also locked due to detecting an invalid PC date. INSITE cannot be registered until it has been unlocked. Please restart INSITE to receive instructions for unlocking INSITE.
To change functionality level, select from list and click Apply or OK. To enter a new password, click Add.
Number of Days Prior to Expiration To Start Warning:
Tool level changes are not allowed for the connected engine program.
The following password(s) will be deactivated on February 17, 2010.\r\n
\r\nPlease contact the local distributor for obtaining new passwords.\r\n
ECM Password Removal - Wrong Feature Password

The password detected is not for ECM Password Removal.
Please check the password and try again. If problem persists, please contact a local distributor for assistance.

The Basic Password was successfully entered.
Do you want to enter the Functional Password now?
Select Yes to enter the Functional Password. Select No to open INSITE in Read Only Mode.

Before registering INSITE, log into the Windows account that will
be used to access INSITE. This will help prevent unnecessary
PCID transfer in case INSITE generates a different PCID for a
different Windows login account.

If this is the Windows account that will be used to access
INSITE, select OK to continue with the registration. Otherwise,
select Cancel and log into the desired Windows account.

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26300</ErrorNumber><Description>An internal error has occurred in the INSITE program.</Description><Suggestion>Close and restart the operation. If the problem persists, please record the error number and contact the local distributor.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>26301</ErrorNumber><Description>An internal error has occurred in the INSITE program.</Description><Suggestion>Close and restart the operation. If the problem persists, please record the error number and contact the local distributor.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
This version of INSITE has expired. To continue using INSITE, please upgrade it to the latest version.
This version of INSITE will expire and be DISABLED in %s day(s). Please upgrade it to the latest version.
